hard_rules: No placeholder TODOs in implementation; ship production-ready code.
Components must use shadcn/ui and be accessible via keyboard.
Contact API must validate via zod and apply basic rate limiting.
Playwright smoke tests must be added and runnable with `npx playwright test`.
Respect reduced motion preferences in animations.
non_goals: No database or user auth for v1.
quality_gates: Axe a11y scan: no critical issues
